_header: Sir he says and Sunday is now
Subjects: Joseph of Arimathea, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of Joseph of Arimathea — 709 alliterative lines

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
…sire he seis and sonenday is nouweÞenne alle lauh when
                    an heiȝ þat herden his wordesHit is two and fourti winter
                    þei seiȝen trewely forsoþe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Siþen þei bi tauȝten þe blod twei burnes to
                    holdenAnd þei lenden of þe toun and leuen hit
                    þere
BodEngPoeta1.Note: Written as prose. 709 lines; begins incomplete.
